content: Settled into my new dorm room. The contrast between Tokyo's serene gardens and NYC's buzzing streets is mind-blowing. Feeling like I've stepped into a new dimension of life. Time to see where this journey takes me.
Took a break from sightseeing to read. This book on Japanese art philosophy really resonates with me. Might start painting again.
Feeling inspired by the book, I've decided to join a local art workshop. Sketching Mount Fuji isn't easy, but it's a start. Here's to new beginnings and finding my place in this vast city.
